department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Invitation to Qualify for Bridge Construction and Repair Service
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement #WS4058919700**

**Tender Title**: Phase 2 EZ899-240322 Bridge Deck Rehabilitation

**Solicitation Number**: WS4058919700-007
**Reference Number**: WS4058919700-Doc4087689357
**Amendment Number**: 1

**Publication Date**: July 6, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: July 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Tender Description**: This tender invitation is for qualifiedenders to submit a bid for the second phase of the EZ899-240322 Bridge Deck Rehabilitation project. Suppliers will be required to submit their tenders in accordance with the tender specifications and bidding instructions outlined in the solicitation document.

**Key Project Details**:

* UN/SPSC Code: 72141107 - Bridge construction and repair services
* Expected contract start date: To be determined
* Expected contract end date: September 15, 2023
* Regions of delivery: Canada, British Columbia

**Trade Agreements**

* This tender is open to Canadian and British Columbia-based suppliers
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies

**Procurement Information**

* Procurement method: Competitive Selective Tendering
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information**

* Name: Serdar Eskicagit, Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: serdar.eskicagit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada


Please note that the provided tender announcement is for informative purposes only and should be reviewed by the tenderer carefully before making any subissions.  a timely performance of this project is essential to save the lives of many ciclist. ####
